key.name: min-word-length
key.summary: Minimum length of a word to be indexed
key.description: Words with less characters than this will be ignored by the indexer.

key.name: max-word-length
key.summary: Maximum length of a word to be indexed
key.description: Words with more characters than this length will be ignored by the indexer.

key.name: max-words-to-index
key.summary: Maximum number of words to index in a document
key.description: Indexer will read only this maximum number of words from a single document.

key.name: enable-stemmer
key.description: Simplify the words to their root to provide more results. E.g. 'shelves' and 'shelf' to 'shel'

key.name: enable-unaccent
key.description: Translate accented characters to the equivalent unaccented. E.g. 'Id√©a' to 'Idea' for improved matching.

key.name: ignore-numbers
key.description: If enabled, numbers will not be indexed.

key.name: ignore-stop-words
key.description: If enabled, the words listed in the stop-words list are ignored. E.g. common words like 'the', 'yes', 'no', etc.
